sentences.en: A variety of viral agents cause aseptic meningitis or meningoencephalitis.

sentences.en: Great care is taken to keep the operating rooms aseptic.

sentences.en: These EM records provide critical data on environmental trends and whether environmental control is maintained during aseptic filling of a batch.
